episode_event_specialcos02_ch0118_41_lil:
When Lillie came to town to go shopping before
the tea party, she ran into Wallace.
Your Pokémon, Polteageist... How wonderful!

And the antique pot it’s living in is a rare
masterpiece as well!
Oh, do you know a lot about tea sets, Wallace?

I wouldn’t say a lot. But I believe I have an eye
for beauty.
Actually, we’re going to buy a tea set right now.
Do you know a good shop for that?
I do indeed! I’ll take you there.

It seems beautiful things really do attract
each other.

Beautiful things... Do you mean Polteageist and
you, Wallace?
No, I mean the two of us and the two of you.

Two beautiful sync pairs tied together by bonds
of friendship!

Oh, right! I’m definitely confident in the strength of
my bond with Polteageist!

*chuckle* Anyway, I’d like to ask your opinion
about something on the way to the shop.

I can’t decide what I should wear to a contest I’ll
be making a guest appearance in soon.

What is beauty? That’s a mystery for the ages,
but let’s discuss it!
Your costume for a contest?

The point I’d most like to concentrate on is...
Oh, I know!

Let’s discuss this like the upcoming tea party—in
the form of a riddle!
That sounds fun! I’ll do my best to answer!
Here’s your question:
What fashion item am I particularly picky about?

For a hint, have a look at my partner Pokémon!
Just like Milotic, it’s long and flutters around
the neck!
Long like Milotic and flutters around the neck...
Oh, I know!

Then tell me your answer! What fashion item am I
most picky about?

Bring me at least one sync pair wearing that item,
and tell me your answer!
The answer is “a scarf,” right?

That’s right! “Scarf” is the correct answer! That
elegant fashion item that flutters about the neck!

Yes! I think scarves are beautiful and cool, just
like Milotic!

Oh, while we were chatting, we made it all the
way to the shop.

Thank you, Wallace! With your help, I was able to
buy a really cute tea set!

Not at all! Thanks to our chat, I’ve formed a better
idea of what I’ll wear to the contest.

Oh, if you don’t mind...I’d like to ask you a
question about fashion!
The outfit I’m wearing now...

Would it be better if I wore a scarf as well as
the hat?

When it comes to fashion, you can’t always
assume that more is better.

I think your outfit suits you very well and goes
perfectly with your partner Polteageist.

In fact, I wouldn’t change a thing! You look
elegant—infuriatingly so!

I’m sure you two will have a lovely time at the
tea party.

Yes! I’m planning to make it the most glorious tea
party ever!
